posts.path: Don't skip on the skip link.md

frontmatter.title: Don't skip on the skip link
frontmatter.description: An introduction on what a skip link is, how it's used and why it's important for us that we implement one. So, if you're confused on what a skip link is, I've got you covered and we'll implement a skip link together.

posts.path: How accessible are links and buttons?.md

frontmatter.title: How are links and buttons understood?
frontmatter.description: Links and buttons are one of the main basic elements that you’ll find on any website. Yet, a lot of them are not as accessible as we would like. If we don't know how they're interpreted by assistive technologies we’re bound to make some mistakes as developers.
